divs: Sighting Detailsi was watching the meteor showers and out no where the house right in front of me was lit up i looked and saw a large object off to the right of the house and about 50ft above the house it had red lights going down the side i flashed my flashlight on and off at it and it rotated to me and flashed me back with light like a equalizer the colors of the lights were red to white to purple i repeated it and it did it again so i went to the beach club where there was the lifegaurds were staying over night and asked them to look up and thats when i saw it was a triangle there was about 10 other people that saw the object other than me it went right over us no sound at all and it went out over the water and it just dropped down and vanished no sound of it hitting the water note the house it was over was empty all summer until that night i know this because i'm the security officer there the next day i meet the people that were staying at that house for the summer which i have never seen before that day i still had there beach pass which they never picked up i think what ever that object was it bought them back Note youtube type RI Anomaly the gaurd is me the people i'm talking to are the people that thing bough back the night before
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Fall River
There were no other sightings in Fall River on or around August 16th 2007
